title: Gentium and Charis updated
content:
Two free SIL fonts have been updated.

Charis:  
Overview at [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=CharisSI](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083527/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item_id=CharisSI "http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=CharisSI")  
Download and List of Changes at [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=CharisSIL\_download](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083527/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item_id=CharisSIL_download "http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=CharisSIL\_download")  
Note the Charis SIL Compact; the "Compact" refers to the leading.

Gentium:  
News: [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=Gentium\_news](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083527/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item_id=Gentium_news "http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=Gentium\_news")  
Download and List of Changes: [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=Gentium\_download](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083527/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item_id=Gentium_download "http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?item\_id=Gentium\_download")  
This release just has the regular and italic versions.

The Gentium Basic version has the Bold fonts as well as a slightly darker Book Basic and Book Basic Bold. These Basic fonts are not updated yet. Info on the Gentium Basic fonts:  
 [http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site\_id=nrsi&id=Gentium\_basi...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317083527/http:/scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site_id=nrsi&id=Gentium_basic#d5f686dc "http://scripts.sil.org/cms/scripts/page.php?site\_id=nrsi&id=Gentium\_basic#d5f686dc")
author: J. Tillman
